Package game

Class Limb

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.Limb
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ZombieArm, ZombieLeg
public abstract class Limb
extends Item
A Limb.

This abstract class provides a template to create objects that are a Limb. In the zombie game, a Limb is considered a physical object.

Provides methods to get the type of limb, making a deep copy and provide a description of the Limb.

Use this class to model different types of limb.

Author:
Isaac Lee Kian Min

      charDisplay - the character to use to represent this item if it is on the ground.
      portable - true if and only if the Item can be picked up.

    • makeCopy

      public abstract Limb makeCopy()
      A method to make a deep copy of the limb object and pass it a Limb reference.

      Implement this method within classes that inherit this class to prevent privacy leaks.

      Returns:
      a copy of the Limb object.
